body.name: Memoqueen Bluetooth Thermal Label Printer for Shipping Packages-4x6 Wireless Shipping Label Printer, D520BT Thermal Printer for Small Business, Compatible with Amazon, Ebay, Shopify, USPS

features: [2024 New Thermal Shipping Label Printer]:Memoqueen bluetooth label printer with ①No ink or toner required②Connects to phone and computer③Built-in thermal paper bin design④Print faster and more efficiently⑤Compatible with most thermal paper on Amazon（More cost-saving）,It is a cost-effective label printer for business

[Perfectly compatible with multiple platforms]:Wireless thermal printer supports the width of 1" - 4.6" thermal labels, the D520BT bluetooth thermal label printer for shipping packages is compatible with almost all platforms, such as Amazon, Ebay, Shopify, USPS, Esty, DHL, Fedex and etc. ( For platform printing, please download the labels from the platform and upload them to the Labelife app for printing.)

[Supports Bluetooth connectivity]:Our bluetooth Shipping thermal printer supports bluetooth connection via Phones/Mac/Windows (bluetooth support iOS& Android, only support Win 10 or above system), if you want to connect via USB you can refer to the manual to connect your computer (Warm Tips : bluetooth need to connected via free Labelife editing app .)
[150mm/s high speed printing]:Memoqueen Wireless themrmal label printer can prints up to 72 4x6 labels per minute,This greatly improves the efficiency of your work and saves you more time.

[A more cost-effective option!]:Memoqueen shipping label printer for small business With the built-in thermal paper bin design, No need to buy a separate paper roll holder, In addition to printing 4X6 labels, you can also print barcode / QR code / Item labels / logo / thanks and more,The "Labelife" app also has many templates to assist you in customizing your personalized labels!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome shipping label maker
reviews.reviewText: So this 4x6 shipping label maker is made by Phomemo and it’s designed really well. It’s very easy to use and the Labelife app you use to print labels is super user friendly. They even have tutorials you can access directly through the main screen in the app.Setup is straightforward and I’ve been using it though Bluetooth which is reliable and connects quickly after I’ve had it paired to my phone. It also has a cord that you can use if you’re planning to use it with a computer but I do everything from my phone so I have yet to need that, it is a good accessory to have though for those who work directly from their computers.Printing labels are also included with this set which is nice, assembling them into the machine is easy and even when you power off the machine and turn it back on you don’t waste any labels, I have a label machine for small round labels and for some reason every time it gets turned back on a label gets pushed out so it’s pretty wasteful, I’m glad this machine doesn’t have the same issue seeing as these labels are much bigger and cost more.Overall this label machine is awesome, I highly recommend it if you’re looking for something reliable, user friendly and affordable for shipping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Bit Confusing
reviews.reviewText: I have yet to use this item, yet. Not because of the poor quality, but because the directions were a bit confusing. I'm sure I'll get the hang of it and will be able to use it at some point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for Small Businesses & Home Offices
reviews.reviewText: I've been installing 4"x6" thermal label printers for quite a while. They're simple to install and easy to maintain. In industrial settings, I tend to like the units that have the labels feed into the printers from behind. In these installations the labels feed from a separate tray placed behind the printer and feed through the printer into a box/basket in front of the printer. Using the external tray allows for a larger supply of blank labels and therefor less down time replenishing the labels. I prefer to use fan folded labels as once they've printed they can stack in front of the printer neatly.For smaller businesses that don't need a dedicated label printer, I prefer this model. This printer stores the labels (on a roll) inside the printer. There are 2 major advantages. First, if you're not using the printer all the time, it keeps the labels protected from the environment and also it makes the printers footprint (including trays and the like) smaller. Taking up less space in a small business or home is an advantage.While a lot of printer manufacturers make thermal shipping label printers, I've gravitated to Phomemo as my manufacturer of choice. They make a solid product, at a very reasonable price and they're also sold by many different vendors.The set up for both Bluetooth and USB is very simple but very different. For Bluetooth connections to mobile devices, you need to download the app and then print using the app. For PC and Mac a driver needs to be installed and then printing from whichever program using this printer as the printer. I use them both ways. You need to know 2 things about connectivity. With the PC and Mac you must connect by USB cable and for IOS or Android you must connect using Bluetooth. Also, the printer gives priority to the USB connection. Meaning if you use both connections, when using Bluetooth you will need to disconnect the USB cable.For myself, I keep one of this model at home and use it both from my Samsung phone and my Windows 11 PC. I love being able to print my own shipping labels for shipments and for returns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Prints fast, Easy set up, but a little finicky connecting to Bluetooth.
reviews.reviewText: This is my first ever Thermal Printer. It has everything you need to get started. I wanted something simple to use for my eBay labels instead of copying and taping the labels on. With this, I go through less tape and ink! It's actually pretty easy to set up. I have mine connected to the computer but you can also use your phone with the app they provide. Do note, unplug cable to computer to use printer from phone. I had no issue printing from my computer; however, I was having trouble getting it to connect to Bluetooth from my phone. What I found that finally worked was turning my Bluetooth off, then back on and then turning the printer on. I have had to do this every time I want to connect to Bluetooth with the printer from my phone. Then go to the app and up in the right-hand corner is a small printer image, click on it. That's where you connect the printer to Bluetooth. Once I got over that learning curve, it was very easy. I found lots of practice labels on line and saved them in pdf to the app and printed them off for a trial run. Also, when first loading the roll of labels, push the button on top of the printer and that will align the roll, just tear the first label off and you're ready to print. The print itself is very clear and bold. It also prints lightning fast! If you don't like the roll type labels, you can also use the stacked labels that thread from the back. I haven't used all the options yet but I'm very happy with it so far. Suits my needs perfectly. Just made printing labels off a lot easier and cheaper than what I had been doing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must-Have for Online Sellers
reviews.reviewText: This printer makes life SO much easier! It's saved me from wasting a ton of paper and ink. Easy to set up, though the directions are a bit hard to follow. It's a really cute unit as well - I love the color! Works like a charm. I would recommend getting a label holder/dispenser to make your experience totally seamless. Highly recommend this printer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great print quality
reviews.reviewText: This little printer is amazing! Set up was so easy, and the print quality is great. I'm only using it with the Bluetooth connection on my android phone with the Labelife app. The app took a little figuring out, but once I did, printing was a breeze. I haven't tried hooking it up to my computer yet.This is such a money saver for me. I used to print out the mailing labels on a full sheet of paper, and then have to cut them and tape them to my packages. The cost of ink is staggering! This printer will pay for itself in no time with the savings in ink cartridges.I use this printer for home use. I probably ship a dozen packages a month to family and friends. I can definitely see this being beneficial to someone with a small home business. I highly recommend it.
